title: Was Red Fort attack planned for January 26? What Faridabad doctor's phone revealed
content: Police are investigating if the recent Red Fort blast was part of a foiled plot targeting Republic Day. Suspect Dr Muzammil Ganaie conducted multiple reconnaissance visits to the Red Fort area in January 2025, suggesting a planned attack on January 26. This plan may have been thwarted by heightened security during the celebrations.

title: Faridabad‚Äôs Al-Falah University breaks silence on terror probe‚Äî Here‚Äôs what they said
content: Al-Falah University has issued a statement addressing recent allegations, clarifying its role and condemning "baseless and misleading stories" online. The university confirmed two doctors were detained but not acting in official capacities, and denied any prohibited materials were used on campus. They pledged full cooperation with investigations and reaffirmed commitment to academic excellence and national security.

title: Where did it go wrong? 1st Nithari investigator recalls delays that doomed probe
content: Nithari village hid horrors for months before 2006 discoveries. A missing woman's complaint led to an investigation.  The case relied heavily on a confession from domestic help Surinder Koli.  Police faced procedural challenges.  Later, Koli was freed in many cases due to doubts about his confession and evidence.

title: Dhruv Jurel to play Eden Test - Ryan ten Doeschate confirms India's combination
content: In-form wicketkeeper-batter Dhruv Jurel is confirmed to play in India's opening Test against South Africa, a decision driven by his stellar recent performances, including two centuries for India A. Assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate indicated Jurel will feature alongside Rishabh Pant, likely as a specialist batter.

title: Trump‚Äôs ‚Äòwage-weighted‚Äô H-1B visa plan: Nasscom issues big warning
content: The Trump administration's proposed shift from an H-1B visa lottery to a wage-weighted system faces strong criticism from Nasscom and other trade bodies. Concerns include operational disruption, potential for manipulation, and negative impacts on early-career professionals and small businesses. Critics argue the move is economically flawed and legally questionable.

title: Engineers sidelined at Meta: Vibe coding to be blamed; sparks debate
content: Meta's Superintelligence Labs product managers are using "vibe coding," an AI-assisted natural language coding technique, to rapidly prototype apps and present them directly to CEO Mark Zuckerberg. This bypasses traditional engineering workflows, accelerating exploration but potentially sidelining engineers. The company is reorganizing product development around AI assistants to achieve these faster iteration cycles.

title: 'She is my wife, nothing to hide': Rashid Khan clarifies viral photo, confirms marriage
content: Afghanistan's star cricketer Rashid Khan has officially confirmed the identity of the woman in a viral photograph from a charity event. He revealed on Instagram that she is his wife, whom he married in August. Rashid clarified that the speculation was unnecessary and emphasized their commitment to transparency, redirecting focus to his foundation's humanitarian work.

title: Delhi blast: Impact lifted and dropped my cab like a toy, survivor recalls
content: A cab driver, Sakir, recounts his harrowing escape from a blast in Delhi, describing his car being violently shaken and windows shattering. He sustained burns but feels fortunate compared to others in the ICU.  Doctors are providing excellent care, and he anticipates a swift discharge. His survival highlights the resilience of victims amidst the chaos.

title: Lionel Messi's Hyderabad visit confirmed - Check details
content: Football legend Lionel Messi is set to visit Hyderabad on December 13, 2025, as part of his 'GOAT India Tour 2025'. Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy confirmed the visit, highlighting it as a proud moment for the state. The tour will also include stops in Kolkata, Mumbai, and New Delhi, culminating in a grand event in Mumbai.

title: ‚ÄòDon‚Äôt have notifications‚Äô: JPMorgan chief ignores most texts; keeps phone off at work
content: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon, leading America's largest bank, minimizes phone use during work, turning off notifications and ignoring texts except from his children. He advocates for focused, distraction-free meetings, believing multitasking signals poor engagement. Dimon also urges US schools to evolve by integrating coding, cybersecurity, and financial management to prepare students for the modern workforce.

title: ‚ÄòI wanna get off!‚Äô: Panic inside US metro as driver dozes off; train races through tunnel
content: A San Francisco train driver fell asleep at the controls, causing a packed Muni metro train to dangerously accelerate through a curve. Panicked passengers were thrown to the floor, with one requiring treatment for a concussion. The SFMTA attributed the incident to operator fatigue after an investigation found no mechanical issues.

title: Turkey cargo plane crash: All 20 aboard killed near Georgia-Azerbaijan border
content: A Turkish military C-130 cargo plane crashed in Georgia near the Azerbaijani border, killing all twenty personnel aboard. The aircraft, en route from Azerbaijan to Turkey, lost contact with authorities shortly after entering Georgian airspace. An investigation into the cause of the crash is underway.

title: Vibe coding: Meta‚Äôs AI chief has advice for teens: Says they should spend time on..
content: Meta's AI chief, Alexandr Wang, urges teenagers to master AI tools, likening the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding' ‚Äì hands-on experimentation with AI ‚Äì to gain a significant future economic advantage, much like early programmers. This rapid, iterative approach is key to understanding and maximizing AI's potential.

title: Why India should push for rollback Russia oil penalty before Trump trade deal
content: India should push for the rollback of 25% tariffs on Russian crude oil before finalizing a trade deal with the US, according to GTRI founder Ajay Srivastava. This move, coupled with India's reduced Russian oil imports, could enhance market access and boost competitiveness in key sectors.

title: Watch: Moment i20 car burst into fireball on busy Red Fort street
content: A devastating blast ripped through a Hyundai i20 near Delhi's Red Fort, claiming at least 12 lives and injuring many. The explosion, occurring during peak evening traffic, engulfed several vehicles in flames. The car, parked for two hours, is linked to a Pulwama owner, with investigators exploring potential terror links and a suspect in an explosives case.

title: Shami's Test snub: 'A clear indicator' - Ex-India assistant coach's bold statement
content: Former India assistant coach Abhishek Nayar believes Mohammed Shami's omission from the South Africa Test squad signals a future-looking approach by the team management. Nayar highlighted Akash Deep's inclusion as a strategic investment, citing his familiarity with conditions and consistent domestic performances. He also emphasized the current squad's strength and adaptability across various surfaces.

title: Was Hyundai car parked at Al-Falah University for over 10 days? What police said
content: Faridabad Police have officially refuted claims circulating on media and social platforms. Reports suggesting a suspicious i20 car, linked to the Red Fort blast, was parked at Al-Falah Hospital or University in Dhauj for over ten days have been denied. The police spokesperson stated they do not confirm this information and are refuting the news.

title: CAT 2025 admit card released: Download from iimcat.ac.in for Nov 30 exam
content: CAT admit card 2025: The Indian Institute of Management (IIM) Kozhikode has released the CAT admit card 2025 on iimcat.ac.in. The exam will be held on November 30 across 170 cities in three shifts. Over 2.95 lakh candidates are registered. The admit card contains essential details including name, photo, roll number, exam centre, and timings. Candidates must carry a valid photo ID and follow instructions. A mock test is available on the official website to familiarise candidates.

title: 'Be a friend, not a boss': Sadhguru on the changing role of parents
content: Spiritual leader Sadhguru emphasizes a shift in parenting.  He advises parents to become companions rather than controllers.  Children need friends who connect and play with them.  Parental influence has decreased, with outside factors now dominating.  Being a friend first builds a stronger bond.  This approach helps raise balanced and happy children.

title: Haris Rauf gets emotional, opens up on criticism, failure vs India
content: Pakistan pacer Haris Rauf, after a match-winning spell, defended his recent form, stating cricketers are human and prone to bad days, not robots. He highlighted the unforgiving scrutiny in Pakistan and urged fans to acknowledge players' consistent efforts despite occasional failures. Rauf also expressed his readiness to play Test cricket.

title: 'Don't have talented people': Is Trump softening rules on aggressive H-1B visa?
content: President Trump acknowledged the necessity of importing foreign talent to maintain America's industrial and technological edge, even while supporting higher wages for American workers. He argued that the US lacks sufficient skilled individuals for complex manufacturing and defense roles, citing an ICE raid on a Hyundai plant as an example of difficulties caused by removing foreign expertise.

title: Red Fort blast: Another Pulwama doctor arrested
content: A major counterterrorism operation has uncovered a trans-state terror module involving radicalized professionals, leading to the arrest of multiple suspects, including four doctors. The module, linked to Jaish-e-Mohammed and Ansar Ghazwat-ul-Hind, amassed a significant cache of explosives and firearms, with investigations revealing a "white-collar terror ecosystem" operating through academic and professional networks.

title: 'It will happen' - Abhishek Sharma reveals new tattoo that defines his mindset
content: India's T20 sensation Abhishek Sharma, the world's top-ranked batter, unveiled a new wrist tattoo reading ‚ÄúIt will happen,‚Äù reflecting his fearless approach.  Sharma's meteoric rise includes record-breaking centuries and stellar performances, positioning him as a key player for the upcoming T20 World Cup on home soil. His unwavering belief fuels his dominance.

title: Gujarat highway heist: Sand mafia convoy blocks woman officer, frees truck
content: A government officer's attempt to seize a sand-laden truck on the Gandhinagar-Kalol highway was met with brazen defiance. Members of the sand mining mafia, using bikers and SUVs, intercepted the officer's team, freed the truck, and threatened the officials. The truck was later found dumping its illegal cargo. Police have registered a case.

title: Govinda health update: Actor advised to see a neurologist after he felt dizzy and fainted
content: Veteran actor Govinda was hospitalized overnight after experiencing dizziness and losing consciousness. His manager confirmed he suffered a severe headache and heaviness in his head, prompting a neurologist consultation. This incident follows his visit to Dharmendra at the hospital. Fans are sending well wishes for the 'Hero No 1' star's recovery.

title: Next-Gen Kia Seltos spied: Striking design, fresh details revealed!
content: The next-generation Kia Seltos has been spotted during test runs, revealing a bolder design with a more upright grille, vertically stacked LED headlamps, and a muscular bumper. The updated SUV is expected to launch in early 2026, featuring a significantly transformed interior with integrated digital displays and advanced tech.

title: 'Anybody ready to mess with us?': Chahal's video with Sanju Samson goes viral - watch
content: The player auction for the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2026 is likely to take place in Abu Dhabi, with December 16 emerging as the most probable date for the event. If confirmed, this will mark the third consecutive overseas auction after previous editions were hosted in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, and Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

title: Delhi blast suspect circled Connaught Place before proceeding to Red Fort
content: A chilling timeline of the i20 car that exploded near Red Fort reveals its journey from Faridabad, with the driver, Mohammed Umar, strategically waiting in a crowded Delhi area.  CCTV footage tracked the vehicle's movements for hours before the devastating blast, which killed nine and injured thirty. Investigators are scrutinizing over a thousand cameras to determine if Umar acted alone.

title: Over 40% of India‚Äôs IT, gig workforce uses AI tools: Is it time to embrace the change?
content: India's workforce is rapidly evolving, with AI becoming a key enabler for over 40% of IT and gig professionals. The nation is transitioning into a global 'brain trust,' driven by digital platforms and government initiatives.  The report highlights the growing importance of human-AI collaboration, emphasizing skills like creativity and critical thinking for future employability.

title: Northern lights visible tonight across US states; how, when and tips to watch
content: Millions across over twenty US states can witness the Northern Lights tonight, November 11-12, 2025. Powerful solar eruptions are pushing the aurora farther south than usual, with visibility expected from Alaska to Pennsylvania.  This rare G4 geomagnetic storm event offers a spectacular celestial display of green, pink, and violet hues.

title: MLB rumors: Cubs target $350M Padres MVP to boost title hopes
content: Following a 2025 playoff exit and the likely departure of Kyle Tucker, the Chicago Cubs are reportedly targeting San Diego Padres outfielder Fernando Tatis Jr. as a major offseason acquisition. Tatis Jr., a dynamic two-time Platinum Glove winner with a long-term contract, is seen as an ideal replacement to bolster Chicago's offense and solidify their outfield for years to come.

title: Michael Willis Heard cause of death: How did the TikTok star Yes King died
content: TikTok sensation Michael Willis Heard, known as 'Yes King,' has passed away. His daughter confirmed the news, remembering him for his uplifting videos promoting self-love and confidence. The Elyria, Ohio native, who also served as a life coach and pastor-like figure, inspired millions with his positive energy. His sudden departure has deeply saddened his global fanbase.

title: Groww IPO listing: Fintech major lists at 14% premium on BSE, 12% on NSE ‚Äì check details
content: Groww shares debuted on Dalal Street with a premium, listing at Rs 114 on the BSE and Rs 112 on the NSE, exceeding grey market expectations. Analysts are cautiously optimistic about the fintech platform's long-term prospects, citing strong customer growth and a scalable business model despite regulatory headwinds.

title: Tata Motors CV listing: Stock debuts strong with 28% premium ‚Äì check price and outlook
content: Tata Motors Commercial Vehicles Ltd. (TMLCV) debuted strongly, listing at a significant premium. Investors are optimistic about India's commercial vehicle upcycle and infrastructure growth. Analysts see the demerger unlocking value, with the Iveco acquisition offering global potential. While near-term volatility is expected, long-term prospects appear bright.

title: Red Fort blast crushes Delhi e-rickshaw driver‚Äôs dreams, leaves family devastated
content: An e-rickshaw driver, Mohammad Jumman, was confirmed dead after his family endured agonizing uncertainty following his disappearance. His last known location was amidst heavy traffic near Lal Qila. Jumman was the sole breadwinner for his specially-abled wife and three children, leaving them in a precarious situation.

title: Panic in Bengaluru: Blast in school toilet, police cite firecracker prank by students
content: Panic erupted at a private school in Anekal after a cracker exploded in a boys' toilet. While initially causing alarm, the incident was traced to a prank involving 'Lakshmi crackers'. No injuries were sustained, but authorities are counseling the responsible students and enhancing safety protocols to prevent future dangerous stunts.

title: Delhi AQI crosses 400: GRAP-3 in force; schools continue hybrid classes
content: Delhi-NCR's air quality plunged into the 'severe' category with an AQI of 413, prompting the Delhi government to activate Stage III of the Graded Response Action Plan. This includes a ban on most construction, industrial operations not using clean fuels, and diesel generators. Schools for younger students are shifting to a hybrid learning model.

title: Price prediction: Will gold continue to rally? Levels investors should watch out for
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are poised for potential gains, with analysts suggesting buying on dips as a smart move.  Factors like a weakening US labor market, increased chances of Federal Reserve rate cuts, and China's continued gold purchases are bolstering the yellow metal. Silver also shows a positive outlook, supported by its critical mineral status.

title: Govinda rushed to hospital after collapse; actor under medical observation
content: Veteran actor Govinda has been hospitalized after reportedly collapsing at his Juhu residence. The 61-year-old star was rushed to CritiCare Hospital in Mumbai and is currently under observation and undergoing tests. Known for his iconic roles, fans are wishing him a speedy recovery.

content: After jumping up three spots, Miami still has plenty to be upset about, but what other teams should be mad?

content: The top five teams remained unchanged in the second set of rankings released by the College Football Playoff selection committee Tuesday, with Ohio State at No. 1, followed by fellow unbeatens Indiana and Texas A&M, and one-loss Alabama and Georgia.

title: Source: CB Alexander stepping away from football
content: Former Pro Bowl cornerback Jaire Alexander has decided to step away from football in order to focus on getting right physically and mentally amid his ongoing recovery from offseason knee surgery, a league source confirmed to ESPN on Tuesday.

content: The NBA announced its overhauled All-Star Game format, including how Adam Silver will make sure the American and International teams both hit their quota of players.

content: Sacramento Kings coach Doug Christie indicated change is coming, saying the struggling team is facing a "bumpy" path and that the organization is "aligned in what we're doing."

content: Cleveland's Stephen Vogt won his second straight AL Manager of the Year award and Milwaukee's Pat Murphy repeated for the NL honor.

title: Dombrowski has 'good conversation' with Harper
content: Dave Dombrowski, Phillies president of baseball operations, said he had a long conversation with star Bryce Harper recently but wouldn't go into specifics about what the two discussed.

title: Jags' Hunter has surgery, out for rest of season
content: Jaguars rookie wide receiver/cornerback Travis Hunter will miss the remainder of the season after undergoing surgery Tuesday to repair the LCL in his right knee.

content: The raids were carried out at several locations across the districts of Shopian, Kulgam, Baramulla, and Ganderbal districts, say officials

content: Translation is a complex process. Language also carries various aspects of culture with it, says winner of International Booker Prize Deepa Bhasthi

content: The External Affairs Minister‚Äôs trip to Canada comes a month after Ms. Anand visited India during which both sides unveiled an ambitious roadmap to boost ties in areas of trade, critical minerals and energy

content: The project will provide a permanent solution to Sedam‚Äôs drinking water problem, says Minister Sharan Prakash Patil

title: How Tamil Nadu witnessed the dramatic arrest and release of Karunanidhi and Stalin in 2001
content: In June 2001, former Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M. Karunanidhi‚Äôs midnight arrest sparked political outrage. Police dragged him from his home and later arrested M.K. Stalin and others in connection with alleged irregularities in the construction of 10 flyovers in Chennai

title: When a car bomb was dismantled after four tense days in Tamil Nadu
content: Killing at least 13 persons, a high intensity bomb blast in a slow moving car near the Red Fort in New Delhi on November 10, 2025 has rocked the country and a terror angle is being probed. About 27 years ago, 60 kg of gelatin explosives planted in an abandoned car at Coimbatore in Tamil Nadu were removed after four nerve-wracking days and detonated.

title: Tamil Nadu among top achievers at Udyog Samagam 2025
content: The Udyog Samagam 2025, held under the aegis of the Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) in New Delhi, was chaired by Union Minister of Commerce and Industry Piyush Goyal.

content: The less moderated online spaces provided by Telegram have also enabled extremists to reach wider masses and do self-promotion, brand development, and propaganda dissemination.

title: Slow-Moving Traffic, Then Big Explosion: CCTV Footage Of Delhi Red Fort Blast
content: Video footage of the bomb blast that ripped through Delhi's Red Fort surfaced today, amid an ongoing investigation into the terror attack that claimed nine lives earlier this week.

title: Bilaspur Train Accident: Probe Reveals Loco Pilot Didn't Clear Aptitude Test
content: At least eleven people were killed and 20 were injured in one of the most horrific train accidents in recent memory when the Gevra-Bilaspur MEMU passenger train rammed a stationary freight train near Lal Khadan, close to Bilaspur's Gatora station.

title: Sample Taken From Delhi Blast Site More Powerful Than Ammonium Nitrate: Sources
content: Not just ammonium nitrate, high-grade explosives were also used in the blast that occurred near the Red Fort in Delhi, an official from the Forensic Science Laboratory said.

title: Adani Cement To Deploy World's 1st 'RotoDynamic Heater' To Reduce Emissions
content: Adani Cement and Finnish company Coolbrook on Wednesday announced to deploy world's first commercial RotoDynamic Heater' to advance cement decarbonisation at the Boyareddypalli Integrated Cement Plant in Andhra Pradesh.

title: "Act Of War": Government Sources Say "Op Sindoor On" After Delhi Blast
content: In a warning to perpetrators of the Delhi terror blast, government sources reiterated that any terror operation on Indian soil will be considered an act of war.

title: PM Modi, Bhutan's Fourth King Discuss Bilateral Ties, Cultural Bonds
content: On Tuesday, Prime Minister Modi and Bhutanese King Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck held extensive discussions covering a wide spectrum of cooperation, including energy, capacity building, connectivity, technology, defence, and security.

title: 'US Doesn't Have Enough Talent': Trump Defends H-1B Visa Plan After Fee Hike
content: US President Donald Trump appears to have softened his stance on his administration's aggressive immigration reforms, saying America needs to bring in foreign talent for certain fields.

title: Red Fort Blast Live Updates: Delhi Blast Suspects Recced Red Fort In January, Sources Say
content: Delhi Blast Live Updates: The anti-terror agency, NIA, has taken over the probe and begun investigations at the scene.

title: 'Rs 58 Crore, Global Links': Police Probe One Of Biggest Digital Arrests
content: The Maharashtra Cyber Department probing the Rs 58 crore digital arrest case in Mumbai has found an international network with links extending to Hong Kong, China and Indonesia, an official said on Tuesday.

title: NCP "Never Misused Power Nor Acted Arrogantly": Ajit Pawar
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar, who heads the ruling NCP, on Tuesday said people continue to repose faith in his party because of its commitment to development and welfare-oriented politics.

title: 'No Changes': Google Denies Removing Western Sahara Border For Morocco Users
content: The dotted lines illustrating the border between Western Sahara and Morocco, indicating the former's disputed territory status, have never been visible to people using Google Maps in the latter, the company told AFP on Tuesday.

title: Bill To Allow 8 Republicans To Seek Damages For Capitol Riot Probe
content: Legislation moving through Congress that would end the government shutdown in the US would also allow eight Republican senators to seek hundreds of thousands of dollars in damages for the capitol riot probe done by the Biden administration.

title: "Foreign Students Good For US": Trump's U-Turn On MAGA's Immigration Agenda
content: In a major U-turn on his immigration agenda, US President Donald Trump has advocated for allowing foreign students to study in American universities.

title: Delhi Blast Victim's Family Wanted Funeral In Hometown Meerut, Wife Refused
content: Mohsin, a resident of Uttar Pradesh's Meerut, was killed in Monday's car bomb blast near Red Fort, Delhi. An argument broke out over the place of his burial.

title: Car Used In Delhi Bomb Blast Was First Seen At Connaught Place, Mayur Vihar
content: The white Hyundai i20 car that exploded near Delhi's Red Fort, killing nine people, was first seen at Connaught Place and Mayur Vihar hours before the blast.

title: i20 Car Used In Delhi Blast Didn't Move For 12 Days, Then Doctor Panicked
content: The suspected suicide bomber, Dr Umar Nabi drove the car out of the college campus on the morning of the attack, November 10, allegedly out of panic.

title: Noel Tata's Son Neville Appointed As Trustee Of Sir Dorabji Tata Trust
content: Tata Trusts Chairman Noel Tata's son Neville was on Tuesday inducted as a trustee on the Sir Dorabji Tata Trust.

title: Samples Of 2 Different Types Of Explosives Recovered From Delhi Blast Site
content: The Forensic Science Laboratory (FSL) team investigating the car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort has recovered two live cartridges and samples of two different types of explosives on Tuesday, sources said.

title: KIFF centenary tributes: Bengal‚Äôs film fraternity hails Ritwik Ghatak as ‚Äòvoice of Partition, pioneer of alternative cinema‚Äô
content: As part of the centenary tribute, the 31st KIFF organised screenings of six of Ghatak‚Äôs films during the festival between November 6 and November 13, along with an exhibition with his memorabilia at Nandan, the panel discussion today, and the Ritwik Ghatak Memorial Conversation between filmmakers Adoor Gopalakrishnan and Anup Singh, scheduled for November 12

title: ‚ÄòUnacceptable‚Äô: Supreme Court condemns alleged assault of Kerala students in Delhi
content: The top court said that such acts of racial discrimination were wholly ‚Äúunacceptable‚Äù in a country founded on pluralism

title: CBI arrests ‚Äòconman‚Äô and his associate in impersonation and bribery case
content: On November 10, the two accused were caught in Delhi while receiving ‚Çπ18 lakh from one Jagjit Singh Gill, sent by Vinod Parihar, CEO of Cybdeer Network Private Limited

title: Cong. alleges ‚Äòvote chori‚Äô in Kochi Corporation
content: District Congress Committee alleges attempts to add voters using the same house number with different house names and forged rental pacts

title: Rajasthan Chief Secretary Sudhansh Pant shifted to Centre
content: Sudhansh Pant‚Äôs sudden transfer to the Centre, following an approval by the Appointments Committee of the Cabinet (ACC) and coming just 14 months before his retirement, has raised speculations in the political and administrative circles in Jaipur

title: Raju Kage writes to Chief Minister seeking statehood for North Karnataka
content: Taking exception to regional imbalances, MLA of Kagawad Assembly segment and chairman of North Western Karnataka Road Transport Corporation (NWKRTC) Bharamagouda (Raju) Kage has raised the issue of a statehood for North Karnataka and has written to chief minister Siddaramaiah on the issue

title: Woman doctor arrested in J&K terror module case linked to Delhi car blast
content: Shaheen Saeed is the eighth accused arrested in the ‚Äúterror module‚Äù linked Jaish-e-Mohammad and Ansar Ghazwat-ul-Hind, and according to a government source, her car was used to ferry explosives. The Delhi blast occurred hours after the discovery of 2,900 kg explosive substances and weapons in Faridabad.

title: A.P. CM reaffirms commitment to Minority welfare
content: Assures free education to Minority girls up to Intermediate, construction of Haj buildings in Kadapa and Vijayawada, one lakh financial assistance to Haj pilgrims

title: Hyderabad to host Northeast-Telugu film screenings on November 21, 22
content: The event has been planned to showcase cinematic diversity and foster cultural exchange between the Northeastern States and Telangana

title: Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal calls for India to go big on medical tourism as current share is ‚Äòminiscule‚Äô
content: Government recognises that India can‚Äôt have a ‚Äúchalk and cheese‚Äù medical system where the domestic population is not eligible for healthcare while our health facilities are focused only on international patients, he added

title: Women outnumber men in turnout despite fewer registrations than men after SIR cuts in Bihar
content: Despite four million fewer registrations, four lakh more women turned out to vote in Bihar‚Äôs Assembly elections

title: Nine exit polls project decisive majority for NDA in Bihar
content: Matrize has given 147-167 seats to NDA, 70-90 to Mahagatbandhan (MGB), 0-2 to Jan Suraaj Party (JSP) and 2-8 seats to others, while People‚Äôs Insight has predicted 133-148 seats for NDA, 87-102 to MGB, 0-2 to JSP, and 3-6 seats to others

title: Sub-registrar, real estate firm owner held for cheating landowner in Bengaluru
content: The complainant, who knew the real estate company owner, had entered into an oral agreement with him to develop residential sites on his land

title: In highest turnout since 1951, Bihar registers 67% polling
content: Poll panel says 62.8% men and 71.6% women voted in the two-phase election; BJP says it will ‚Äúbreak the record of the 2010 election results‚Äù; Opposition says there is a wave in their favour, asks party workers to remain vigilant against ‚Äòvote thieves‚Äô

title: Supreme Court raps Uttarakhand High Court for staying prosecution of former Director of Corbett Tiger Reserve over illegal tree-felling
content: Earlier, the Bench had directed the Indian Forest Service officer to appear before it on November 11 to explain why contempt proceedings should not be initiated against him for moving the High Court despite being aware that the matter was pending before the Supreme Court

title: Don‚Äôt use COP30 to change ‚Äòarchitecture‚Äô of Paris deal: India
content: The architecture refers to the ‚Äòcommon but differentiated responsibilities‚Äô, which means that countries must do their bit to curb fossil fuel emissions without compromising on national priorities; India says the parties ‚Äúmust remain committed to and guided by equity‚Äù

title: Trinamool demands Home Minister resign for ‚Äòfailures on an industrial scale‚Äô
content: The West Bengal ruling party demanded the resignation of Union Home Minister Amit Shah over the Delhi blast and sought an explanation from the Prime Minister for visiting Bhutan just a day after the blast

title: States ruled by non-BJP parties insist on wider consultation on draft labour policy and codes
content: Labour Minister Mansukh Mandaviya launches Labour Chowk app to connect construction workers with employers

title: DDRC accelerates Uppada coastal wall construction and ghats development in Kakinada
content: 11 ghats will be developed along the river Godavari for Godavari Pushkarams-2027 in Kakinada district.

title: AAP, Congress attack BJP over security ‚Äòlapses‚Äô; Delhi to pay ‚Çπ10 lakh to kin of blast victims
content: The AAP said that sympathy over social media has no value if the government cannot even provide ambulances for families to take the dead bodies home

title: Imported ideas like ‚Äòinter-generational equity‚Äô are anthropocentric, may not protect endangered species: Justice Narasimha
content: Justice Narasimha made these oral observations while hearing a petition on the conservation of the dying species of the Great Indian Bustard, which is being bred in captivity, and the Lesser Florican

title: Left parties condemn blast, call for time-bound probe
content: Both parties appealed to the public to remain vigilant and maintain peace and harmony, cautioning against any attempts at provocation.

title: Uttar Pradesh on high alert, raid conducted in Lucknow
content: Security arrangements at important establishments, religious places, crowded places, and other sensitive points are being re-reviewed and increased

title: Residents apprehensive despite KWA‚Äôs assurance of restored water supply in Kochi
content: ‚ÄòThe concern is shared by consumers living at the tail end of the water distribution network, who often face disruptions whenever pipe bursts occur‚Äô

title: Differences in fares between budget and regular airlines blur
content: There has been no significant differences in fares between budget airlines and full-service airlines

title: Pawan Kalyan proposes Sanatana Dharma Parirakshana Board to safeguard Hindu traditions

title: Early bets for Week 11: Bengals and Dolphins to cover, plus an MVP pick
content: the new England Patriots host the division rival New York Jets on "Thursday Night Football" the rest of the day features a plethora of marquee matchups, including the Tampa Bay Buccaneers visiting the Bills, the Seattle Seahawks and Los Angeles Rams . the Denver Broncos hosts the Kansas City Chiefs in a key AFC West clash .

title: Women's Bracketology: All eyes on L.A. as Bruins, Trojans get statement wins
content: the first bracket of the 2025-26 season is here, and plenty of key matchups over the first week are already shaping the bracket . the rest of the top 16 has seen early upheaval with weekly updates each Tuesday .

title: CFP rankings release: See the second top 25 and bracket
content: the college football playoff committee will release its rankings each Tuesday through the end of the regular season . the final set of rankings will be released on Dec. 7 and those rankings will determine the final 12-team bracket . based on the CFP top 25 .

title: A drawn knife, an escape by train, a decorated military figure and Georgia Tech's first win
content: the first lieutenant, 33, arrived on horseback to the campus in the fall of 1893 . he registered as a "sub-apprentice" in a woodworking course so he could qualify . any aspirations of becoming a master craftsman, though, were secondary .

title: Will Travis Hunter's injury change how Jaguars use him in 2026? Answering top questions
content: the Jacksonville Jaguars announced that he is having season-ending knee surgery . the no. 2 pick finished his rookie season with 28 catches for 298 yards and a touchdown . he had 15 tackles and three pass breakups on defense .

title: Breaking down each team's City Edition uniform
content: the 2025-26 season marks the ninth campaign of the collaboration between the Nike and the NBA on the uniforms . this year's theme is all about "remixing" previous designs . the "Cream City" threads are back for the San Antonio Spurs and the "California Dream" for the Los Angeles Lakers .

title: Are Chelsea meeting expectations? 9 stats that explain their confusing season
content: Est√™vo came off the bench to help Chelsea beat Wolverhampton 3-0 . a question that should be easier to answer than it is: Are Chelsea succeeding? for most teams, it's close to black and white . sunderland have all but clinched another year in the top flight .

title: Women's bantamweight top 10 undergoes an overhaul
content: a pair of women's bantamweight bouts have reshuffled the ESPN divisional rankings . Norma Dumont won a split decision over Ketlen Vieira on Nov. 1 . jacqueline Cavalcanti defeated Mayra Bueno Silva unanimously .

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in? Who's out? Who's close after the second ranking?
content: a big winner might have been the entire state of Texas . the no. 3 Aggies are still in a first-round bye position . no. 15 Miami regained its position as the committee's top ACC team .

title: Passan's perfect move for 21 MLB teams that could go big this offseason
content: a deluge of moves is coming between now and the new year . there are caveats: at least one team on this list will sign multiple players . some players who could be on here are a stretch because of budgets .

title: How to watch ESPN amid Disney-YouTube TV blackout
content: the blackout affects ABC, the ESPN networks, the Disney-branded channels, Freeform, the FX networks and the Xfinity network . the conflict affects the channel's ability to carry Disney programming . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services including Cox, Dish, DirecTV, Fios, Fubo, Hulu + Live TV, Mediacom, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum TV and
